title: Andrew Rothschild - The Stampede of Life
description:
Andrew Rothschild is fore-running a new genre called Bluestronica where his primary expertise of guitar revolutionizes the Blues within Electronica for a journey-like experience.

Andrew personally uses his dominant choice of instrument to construct living atmospheres up-heaving from his roots of Blues, Folk and Classic Rock. Rothschild combines these genres within the modern choice of Electronica for the next step in the evolution of the Blues. Andrew fuses nature oriented sounds, resonated didgeridoos, and conversing vocals through the glue of lush reverb and vast delays.

Taking the rustic, primitive energy from the Blues and the refined, bright vitality from Folk: Andrew Rothschildâ€™s music can certainly attract the older generations while the newer generation can heavily indulge with his cosmic approach to Electronica. Ultimately, Andrew distills his atmospheres with his personal craft of integrating nature oriented accents, fluent finger-picking, and Hendrix styled lead.

With the release of his debut album, The Stampede of Life, make sure to keep in tune to this artisan in the forthcoming months for the resuscitated quality of authentic music weaved within the eternal world of Electronica.

Support him on Itunes, Amazon, Google Play & more if you would like.



Find out more at http://aroths.com/



Enjoy!
